灧字的基本解释

yàn
见“滟”。

灧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《詳校篇海》以贍切］
亦作“灎1”。亦作“灔1”。亦作“灩1”。“滟1”的繁体字。
(1)水浮动貌。
(2)水盈溢貌。
(3)指盈溢。
(4)水光耀貌。

灧字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灧； 康熙笔画：28； 页码：页664第25
【正字通】俗灩字。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yàn］
["Detailed School Pianhai" is cut by support]
Also known as "灎1". Also known as "None 1". Also known as "Yan 1". Traditional characters for "滟1".
(1) The appearance of water floating.
(2) Water overflowing appearance.
(3) Refers to profit and overflow.
(4) Water is shining.
